tool_description: Verifies incident investigation compliance with relevant workplace safety regulations, standards, and reporting requirements.

incident_id.description: Unique incident identifier to check compliance for

jurisdiction.description: Legal jurisdiction: federal, state, local, international

incident_severity.description: Incident severity level: minor, moderate, serious, critical, fatal

checker_name.description: Name of compliance officer performing check

error_messages: Invalid incident ID: Incident ID must correspond to an existing investigation case.
Invalid jurisdiction: Must be one of [federal, state, local, international].
Invalid severity level: Must be one of [minor, moderate, serious, critical, fatal].
Industry sector required: Specify industry sector for regulation applicability.
Missing checker information: Compliance checker name is required for audit trail.
usage: Provide incident_id, jurisdiction, industry_sector, incident_severity, and checker_name. Evaluates investigation compliance with applicable regulations and identifies requirements.

applicable_regulations.description: List of regulations that apply to this incident
